local_intent: Perceive grapes, approach and align to them with tight tolerance, then verify the end-effector is at the grape target before proceeding.
assumptions: Grapes are reachable and not occluded beyond scanning capability
Safe approach path exists for alignment from current pose
coherence_with_global: Matches global flow: visibility check/scan, detect, precise ApproachAndAlign (tolerance 0.005), then verify position before subsequent pick. Uses identical targets and timing bins.
